etymology.interpretation: Adds the nominal suffix 子 to the root 梳 ‘to comb’ to name the object. Emphasizes a small, tangible implement.

parts.english: comb; to comb; to smooth; to untangle

examples.chinese: 我用梳子梳头(我用梳子梳頭)。
examples.english: I use a comb to comb my hair.

examples.chinese: 这把梳子很轻(這把梳子很輕)，带在包里很方便(帶在包裡很方便)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè bǎ shūzi hěn qīng, dài zài bāo lǐ hěn fāngbiàn.
examples.english: This comb is light, and carrying it in the bag is convenient.

examples.chinese: 请把梳子递给我(請把梳子遞給我)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shūzi dì gěi wǒ.
